SEARCH
Package src.view

Class DoctorView

Object
MainView
DoctorView
public class DoctorView extends MainView
DoctorView class represents the view for doctor-specific functionalities in the hospital management system. It allows the doctor to manage patient medical records, schedule appointments, update patient information, and handle appointment requests, among other tasks.
Since:
2024-11-20
Version:
1.0
Author:
Seann

    Constructors

    Description
    DoctorView()
    Constructs a DoctorView object, initializing the view with the main menu.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    handleDoctorUnavailability(String doctorID)
    Handles the process of marking a doctor's availability as unavailable for a specific date and time slot.
    void
    printMenu()
    Displays the main menu for the doctor with options to view and update patient records, manage appointments, change password, and log out.
    void
    viewApp(String hospitalID)
    Handles the user input and allows the doctor to perform actions based on the selected menu option.
